meaning_str.bing:
n. 赛马；【动】马；(体操用)木马；脚手架
网络. 马科动物；骑马；骑兵

赛马；【动】马；(体操用)木马；脚手架

马；赛马；支架；脚手架；（象棋中的）马（即骑士）；<俚语>海洛因
为…备马；给…配备马匹；戏弄；开玩笑；嬉戏；猛推；用力向上举

1.en: Traditional Labour supporters have accused the new leadership of being a Trojan horse trying to destroy the party from within.
1.cn: 老的工党支持者指责新领导乃是试图从内部摧毁党的特洛伊木马。

2.en: Before the railway came into being , a four- horse coach was a popular means of transportation .
2.cn: 在铁路出现之前，四匹马拉的马车是流行的交通工具。

3.en: Bela held her hand out to the horse again. "I shall call you 'Halidarre, ' girl-after the free sky-spirit of our great heroine. "
3.cn: 她再次向马伸出了手。“我称你为哈丽达尔，以我们伟大天空女神的女儿为你命名。”

0.en: Bring me my horse, please. Anna, no. It's too dangerous.
0.cn: 把我的马牵来。安娜，别这样，太危险了。

2.en: He sent a horse messenger, but the rebels intercepted.
2.cn: 他派人快马报信但是被残党截获了。

3.en: It's a good one, too, because a horse has a long face.
3.cn: 还是个非常好笑的笑话，因为马的脸很长。

4.en: Horse, but mostly just for the height. A little bit for the genital girth. Wrong, and let's keep it clean, shall we?
4.cn: 我选马，主要是因为马比较高，其次是因为生殖器比较大。错，能让这话题保持点格调吗？

5.en: That's my horse. That's yours? Yes, I brought it back from Colombia.
5.cn: 这是我的马[白粉]。这是你的吗？是啊，我从哥伦比亚带来的。

6.en: You told me you wanted to be a veterinarian. You told me you gave birth to a horse. That had to hurt. Why wouldn't you tell me about this?
6.cn: 你曾跟我说你想当一个兽医，你还告诉我你给马接生过。生马一定很疼吧。你怎么就是没告诉我这事呢？

7.en: The animals include the horse, goat, tiger, rooster, dog, pig. And, of course, the monkey.
7.cn: 生肖里包括马，羊，虎，鸡，狗，猪。当然还有猴。

8.en: I think "A horse goes into a bar, bartender says, 'Why the long face?'" That's a joke.
8.cn: 我觉得"一匹马走进酒吧，酒保说，为什么拉长一张马脸[闷闷不乐]？"这种才是笑话。

9.en: And develop an insane Pilates habit, and buy a dog, or a horse, and develop a crush on your riding instructor.
9.cn: 然后逐渐养成疯狂做普拉提的习惯，买条狗或一匹马，然后看上了骑术教练。

10.en: What's your point? My point is, if I were a horse or a bird, I'd be very nervous around James Cameron.
10.cn: 你到底想说什么？也就是说，如果我是马或者鸟，我在詹姆斯·卡梅隆身边会相当紧张。

11.en: One time I remember the horse went lame and we both got stuck in the mud. Oh, the talking we had to do when we got back!
11.cn: 我记得有次马走不动了，我们俩一起困在了泥地里，我们回来好一顿解释啊。

12.en: Only the most advanced kung fu artists are allowed to be lion dancers. It takes two performers in complete synchronicity, like a highly acrobatic pantomime horse.
12.cn: 只有功夫最高超的师傅才有资格舞狮。两名表演者需要完全同步，这类似于技艺高超的哑剧马。

13.en: Sure! And you wouldn't even have to pay me back by letting me use your barn and your horse tomorrow night for a live nativity scene, which you would all have to be in.
13.cn: 当然，你甚至不用报答我，真的不用明晚借出你们的马厩和马，更不用集体参与，帮我创造一个耶稣诞生实景。

14.en: Yeah, I am pulling out all the stops. There's a $39.95 lover's special at P.F. Chang's. Egg rolls, dumplings, bottomless wok, and you get your picture taken on the big marble horse out front.
14.cn: 啊，我可是绞尽脑汁了。华馆提供了39.95美金的情侣特典套餐。蛋卷啊，饺子啊，数不清的炒菜，最后你还能和门口硕大的大理石马合影留念。

15.en: Horsey. Horsey. George wants to ride on the toy horse. Go. Go. Oh. George cannot make the horse go.
15.cn: 小马！乔治想骑一骑玩具小马。驾！驾！噢！乔治没法让玩具小马动起来。

16.en: I'm optimistic. Wind's blowing our way. Is this a Trojan horse? Reese, may I call you back? Trojan horse?
16.cn: 我挺乐观的，局势对我们有利。这是木马计吗？里斯，我再打给你好吗？木马计？

17.en: You shall be tutored in the Mongolian ways of the horse.

18.en: Perhaps you should play with the toy horse outside. Yes, Mummy.
18.cn: 噢！也许你应该带着玩具小马去外面玩。说得对，妈妈。

19.en: The cow goes moo. The horse goes neigh. It's all the people talked back then.
19.cn: 奶牛哞哞叫，小马咴咴叫，那会儿人们就只会说这些。
